name: Fees
text:
§505-4  Fees.  Unless otherwise provided by rules established by the department of land and natural resources, pursuant to chapter 91, the fees payable under this chapter are as follows:
     For each notice of federal tax lien in the bureau of conveyances, $10;
     For each certificate of release, partial release, or discharge of a federal tax lien in the bureau of conveyances, $10. [L 1931, c 220, §5; RL 1935, §5194; RL 1945, §12794; am L 1949, c 56, §1; RL 1955, §346-4; am L 1966, c 33, §12; HRS §505-4; am L 1973, c 128, §2; am L 1989, c 47, §14]
 
Cross References
 
  Modification of fees, see §92‑28.
